subject: LIVE Ghost Box is running now until Midnight!
author: Urkel23
full_text:
LIVE Ghost Box Tonight at 6pm est

 Like I did last year, I will be letting the ghost box run live on air and let people have the opportunity to come and chat and listen to what they hear.

 Here is the link to do so:
 
http://www.stevehultay.com/talkradiogolive.html

 It will start at 6pm est tonight and run until Midnight.

 See Ya There,
 -Steve H.
